product_name: Kuhl Riot Raw Denim Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: The Kuhl Riot(TM) Raw Denim pants with 32 in. inseam feature a premium cotton denim fabric with a touch of spandex for stretchy comfort on your casual days at home or quick hikes into the hills. Inside of fabric is peached for next-to-skin comfort. Waistband is lined with soft sueded fabric for comfort next to skin. Gusseted crotch and articulated knees allow great range of motion. Kuhl Riot Raw Denim pants have a standard five-pocket design, plus a stealth cell phone pocket.
short_description: The Kuhl Riot(TM) Raw Denim pants with 32 in. inseam feature a premium cotton denim fabric with a touch of spandex for stretchy comfort on your casual days at home or quick hikes into the hills.
